name: Vessel of the Formless One • A class for MÖRK BORG
name_original: Vessel of the Formless One • A class for MÖRK BORG
description:
The Formless One is an amalgamation of eight spiteful Gods; Harkla, Vittra, Last, Dröm, Allt, Sattyg, Sken and Sorg.

You are an honorless outcast, a witless stray and sad excuse of a human being. Regardless, you have been chosen by a formless deity as their vessel, their voice and their harbinger; forced to spread their dreadful gospel.

Vessel of the Formless One is an independent production by DETHKVLT.SE and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.

MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
